header.title: Hostel Admission Process for First-Year UG, PG, and Dual Degree Students (Session: 2025-26) NIT Agartala and IIIT Agartala

hostel_fee_payment.description: All first-year UG, PG, and Dual Degree students must deposit hostel and mess fees through MIS online payment mode.
hostel_fee_payment.MIS_login: Use login ID received via email or SMS. To create a password, visit https://mis.nita.ac.in/ and click 'Generate or Forgot Password'.

fee_details.girls_hostel_priority: Out-of-state students first, then Tripura students by distance

initial_fee.procedure: Login MIS --> Online Payment --> SBI EPAY --> Common Payment Interface --> Select Receipt Type

hostel_mess_fee.procedure: Login MIS --> Online Payment --> SBI EPAY --> Common Payment Interface --> Select Receipt Type --> Hostel Fee --> Pay

room_allotment.procedure: Login MIS --> Hostel --> Transaction --> Automatic Room Allotment --> Allot Room

documents_required: Hard copy of filled hostel application form

IGH_info.availability: Rooms available on payment basis, prior booking required via ighnita@gmail.com

fields: Allotted Hostel Details (Name, Block No, Room No)

rules_and_regulations: Maintain peace and quiet inside hostel and mess
Ragging is strictly prohibited; report incidents to authorities
Keep allotted room/floor/corridor/toilet clean and follow COVID-19 protocols
Only laptops, mobile phones, and power banks allowed; other electrical appliances prohibited
Fighting is punishable
Cooking and pets not allowed
Motor vehicles prohibited on campus for hostellers
No smoking, alcohol, or tobacco
No lethal weapons in hostel premises
Mess utensils cannot be taken outside
Unauthorized accommodation by hostellers is prohibited
Only lady guardians allowed to visit Gargi Hostel on specified days
Do not paste or write on walls/furniture
Room changes only with approval
Administration can shift students for discipline
Do not write personal info on room doors
Celebrations/parties inside hostel prohibited
No loud music or disruptive activities
Hostellers must obtain prior permission for leave or visiting home
Mess leave max 8 days per month
No entry into opposite gender hostels or junior hostels without permission
Roof usage prohibited
Curfew timings for boys: 10 PM - 4:30 AM; girls as per notifications
Backlog exam stay rules specified
Late entry register maintained; warnings issued after 3 late entries
Students liable for damages; misuse of water/electricity punished
Hosteller responsible for valuables; administration not liable
Mess joining mandatory; individual cooking outside prohibited
